content: {"version":1,"machineId":"b47aa4bf-21bc-4dfe-9785-f31d24983124","content":"{\"scala.json\":\"{\\n\\t// Place your snippets for scala here. Each snippet is defined under a snippet name and has a prefix, body and\\n\\t// description. The prefix is what is used to trigger the snippet and the body will be expanded and inserted. Possible variables are:\\n\\t// $1, $2 for tab stops, $0 for the final cursor position, and ${1:label}, ${2:another} for placeholders. Placeholders with the\\n\\t// same ids are connected.\\n\\t// Example:\\n\\t// \\\"Print to console\\\": {\\n\\t// \\t\\\"prefix\\\": \\\"log\\\",\\n\\t// \\t\\\"body\\\": [\\n\\t// \\t\\t\\\"console.log('$1');\\\",\\n\\t// \\t\\t\\\"$2\\\"\\n\\t// \\t],\\n\\t// \\t\\\"description\\\": \\\"Log output to console\\\"\\n\\t// }\\n\\t\\\"print line\\\": {\\n\\t\\t\\\"prefix\\\": \\\"p\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\\"body\\\": [\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"println($1)\\\",\\n\\t\\t]\\n\\t},\\n\\t\\\"doc block\\\": {\\n\\t\\t\\\"prefix\\\": \\\"/**\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\\"body\\\": [\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"/** $1 */\\\"\\n\\t\\t]\\n\\t},\\n\\t\\\"main object\\\": {\\n\\t\\t\\\"prefix\\\": \\\"main\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\\"body\\\": [\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"object main {\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"  def main(args: Array[String]): Unit = {\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"    $1\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"  }\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"}\\\"\\n\\t\\t]\\n\\t}\\n}\",\"typescript.json\":\"{\\n\\t// Place your snippets for typescript here. Each snippet is defined under a snippet name and has a prefix, body and\\n\\t// description. The prefix is what is used to trigger the snippet and the body will be expanded and inserted. Possible variables are:\\n\\t// $1, $2 for tab stops, $0 for the final cursor position, and ${1:label}, ${2:another} for placeholders. Placeholders with the\\n\\t// same ids are connected.\\n\\t// Example:\\n\\t// \\\"Print to console\\\": {\\n\\t// \\t\\\"prefix\\\": \\\"log\\\",\\n\\t// \\t\\\"body\\\": [\\n\\t// \\t\\t\\\"console.log('$1');\\\",\\n\\t// \\t\\t\\\"$2\\\"\\n\\t// \\t],\\n\\t// \\t\\\"description\\\": \\\"Log output to console\\\"\\n\\t// }\\n\\t\\\"pretty print\\\": {\\n\\t\\t\\\"prefix\\\": \\\"d\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\\"body\\\": [\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"console.log(JSON.stringify('$1', undefined, 2));\\\",\\n\\t\\t\\t\\\"$2\\\",\\n\\t\\t],\\n\\t\\t\\\"description\\\": \\\"debug log\\\"\\n\\t}\\n}\"}"}
